  ::Kup::

  Kup watched as Grimlock came up, and literally spat a Predaco=
n into the brig. Kup starts laughing.

  "Unconventional brute force. No wo=
under we always kept you Dinobots around."

  Kup continues to moniter acti=
vity inside the brig.

  ::Hot Rod::

  As soon as Hot Rod saw Nightshade t=
here was a familiar feeling about her, and her words confirmed it.

  "Arce=
e!"

  Hot Rod face lit up with big bright eyes. He couldn't help his excit=
ment. He ran upto Arcee and hugged her.

  "Oh man, its great to see you! I=
ts been so long. How did you get here, and as a Predacon?"

  Hot Rod's mou=
th was going at 100 miles per hour with questions.


  {Grimlock}

      Gr=
imlock stopped at the brig door turning to look at Kup, the robotic t-rex h=
ead cocking at the use of a complex word. Considering it nothing bad he jus=
t grunted and stomped off through the ship.

  {Nightshade}

      Nightsha=
de pushed Hot Rod off of her as she spoke, "Slow down Hor Rod, not as fast =
as I use to be and things change. People change. After the great wars and t=
hings started settling down and getting back on track times were good. Then=
 came the big down grade as I call it, with the evolution of the maximals a=
nd predicons we weren't left much choice than to lose our old bodies in ord=
er to fit in with our kin. Then we began integrating with organics more and=
 more. I still remember Spike and Danial and the rest of the human race but=
 I didn't want to be part of it."

      Turning away from Hot Rod, "I obje=
cted and fought back against these movements. I'm with the rest who believe=
 in technological purity on Cybertron. Unfortunately the more avid believer=
s are the radicals of the predicons. I fell in with them, more or less beco=
ming a predicon. Fighting alongside the decendants of the decepticons. It m=
ade me sick at first, but then I saw the corruption in the Maximals. They'r=
e not like the Autobots, they're as bad as the predicons in their own way."=


      Looking back her eyes narrowed, "Needless to say I was captured and=
 being detained when Megatron broke free and took a group of preds with him=
. I went along. It was either throw my ties in with a group that didn't tru=
st me nor I them but at least we understood each other or stay there and re=
cieve maximal justice...no thanks..."
